item.title: Ubuntu Budgie 22.10 Released!
item.dc:creator: David
item.description: We are pleased to announce the release of the next version of our distro, the 22.10 release. This is a standard release supported for 9 months packed full of all sorts of new capabilities. If you want a well tested and longer term support then our 22.04.1 LTS version is supported for 3 years. The […]
item.content:encoded:
We are pleased to announce the release of the next version of our distro, the 22.10 release. This is a standard release supported for 9 months packed full of all sorts of new capabilities. If you want a well tested and longer term support then our 22.04.1 LTS version is supported for 3 years. The new release has many new core updates as well as a bleeding edge version of budgie itself…

Source
